text: howard_wolowitz Watch this , it 's really cool . Call Leonard Hofstadter .
howards_phone Did you say , call Helen Boxleitner ?
howard_wolowitz No . Call Leonard Hofstadter .
howards_phone Did you say , call Temple Beth Sader .
howard_wolowitz No .
leonard_hofstadter Here , let me try . Call McFlono McFloonyloo . Heh - heh .
howards_phone Calling Rajesh Koothrappali . .
raj_koothrappali Oh , that 's very impressive . And a little racist .
sheldon_cooper If we 're all through playing mock the flawed technology , can we get on with Halo night , we were supposed to start at eight , it is now 8 .
leonard_hofstadter So ? We 'll start now .
sheldon_cooper Yes , first we have to decide if those lost six minutes will be coming out of game time , bathroom time or the pizza break .
raj_koothrappali We can split it two , two and two .
howard_wolowitz If we 're having anchovies on the pizza we ca n't take it out of bathroom time .
sheldon_cooper Oh , what fresh hell is this ?
leonard_hofstadter Hey Penny , come on in .
penny Hey guys .
howard_wolowitz See a Penny , pick her up , and all the day you 'll have good luck .
penny No you wo n't . Uh , can I hide out here for a while .
leonard_hofstadter Sure . What 's going on .

penny Well , there 's this girl I know from back in Nebraska , Christy , well anyway she called me up and she 's like ' Hey , how 's California , ' and I 'm like ' Awesome ' 'cause , you know , it 's not Nebraska , and the next thing I know she 's invited herself out here to stay with me .
sheldon_cooper 8 .

penny Anyway , she got here today , and she 's just been in my apartment , yakkety - yakking about every guy she 's slept with in Omaha , which is basically every guy in Omaha , and washing the sluttiest collection of underwear you have ever seen in my bathroom sink .
howard_wolowitz Well , is she doing it one thong at a time , or does she just throw it all in , like some sort of erotic bouillabaisse ?
penny He really needs to dial it down .
leonard_hofstadter So , if you do n't like this Christy , why are you letting her stay ?
penny Well , she was engaged to my cousin while she was sleeping with my brother , so she 's kind of family .
sheldon_cooper You know , I apologize for my earlier outburst , who needs Halo when we can be regaled with the delightfully folksy tale of the whore of Omaha ?
leonard_hofstadter Oh , I do n't think she 's a whore .
penny No , yeah she 's definitely a whore . I mean , she has absolutely no standards , this one time , she was at ... where 's Howard ?
howard_wolowitz Bonjour mademoiselle , I understand you 're new in town .
sheldon_cooper Oh good grief .
penny Ugh , I can not believe Christy let Howard into my apartment .
sheldon_cooper And I can not believe people pay for horoscopes , but on a more serious note it 's 8 and we 're still not playing Halo .
leonard_hofstadter Okay , fine , we 'll just play one on one until he gets back .
sheldon_cooper One on one ? We do n't play one on one , we play teams , not one on one . One on one !
leonard_hofstadter Well the only way we can play teams at this point is if we cut Raj in half .
raj_koothrappali Oh , sure , cut the foreigner in half , there 's a billion more where he came from .
penny Hey , if you guys need a fourth , I 'll play .
leonard_hofstadter Great idea .
sheldon_cooper Uh , no . The wheel was a great idea . Relativity was a great idea . This is a notion , and a rather sucky one at that .
penny Why ?
sheldon_cooper Why ? Oh , Penny , Penny , Penny .
penny Oh , what , what , what ?
sheldon_cooper This is a complex battle simulation with a steep learning curve , there are myriad weapons , vehicles and strategies to master , not to mention an extremely intricate back - story .
penny Oh cool , whose head did I just blow off ?
sheldon_cooper Mine .
penny Okay , I got this , lock and load boys .
leonard_hofstadter It 's the only way we can play teams .
sheldon_cooper Yes , but whoever 's her partner will be hamstrung by her lack of experience and not to mention that fact that sh ... .
penny Ha - ha , there goes your head again .
sheldon_cooper Okay , this is n't at all good sportsmanship to shoot somebody who 's just respawned , you need to give them a chance to now come on !
sheldon_cooper Raj , Raj , she 's got me cornered , cover me .
penny Cover this , suckers . Ha - ha - ha !
leonard_hofstadter Penny , you are on fire .
penny Yeah , so is Sheldon .
sheldon_cooper Okay , that 's it , I do n't know how , but she is cheating . No - one can be that attractive and be this skilled at a video game .
penny Wait , wait , Sheldon , come back , you forgot something .
sheldon_cooper What ?
penny This plasma grenade . Ha ! Look , it 's raining you !
sheldon_cooper You laugh now , you just wait until you need tech support .
penny Gosh , he 's kind of a sore loser , is n't he ?
leonard_hofstadter Well , to be fair , he is also a rather unpleasant winner .
penny Well , it 's been fun .
leonard_hofstadter You know , Penny , we make such a good team , maybe we could enter a couple of Halo tournaments sometime .
penny Or we could just have a life .
leonard_hofstadter I guess for you that 's an option .
penny Good night , Leonard .
leonard_hofstadter Good night .
penny As usual , nice talking to you Raj .
raj_koothrappali What do you suppose she meant by that ?
leonard_hofstadter She 's an enigma , Raj .
sheldon_cooper And another thing , there 's a certain ethic to the game , Penny , a well estab ... .
leonard_hofstadter She 's gone , Sheldon .
sheldon_cooper Well she could have said goodbye .
penny Okay , I have a problem .
sheldon_cooper It 's called carpal tunnel syndrome , and quite frankly you deserve it .
leonard_hofstadter What 's wrong ?
penny Um , well , Howard and Christy are ... kind of ... hooking up in my bedroom .
leonard_hofstadter Are you sure ?
penny Look , I grew up on a farm , okay , from what I heard they 're either having sex or Howard 's caught in a milking machine . Do you mind if I stay here tonight ?
leonard_hofstadter No , take the couch , or my bed , I just got new pillows , hypo - allergenics .
penny Uh , the couch is good .
sheldon_cooper Hold that thought , Leonard , a moment .
leonard_hofstadter Let me guess , you have a problem with this .
sheldon_cooper Where do I begin ?
leonard_hofstadter It 's up to you , crazy person 's choice .
sheldon_cooper Well first , we do n't have house guests , frankly if I could afford the rent , I 'd ask you to leave .
leonard_hofstadter Your friendship means a lot to me as well , what else ?
sheldon_cooper Well , our earthquake supplies , we have a two day , two man kit .
leonard_hofstadter So ?
sheldon_cooper So , if there is an earthquake and the three of us are trapped here , we could be out of food by tomorrow afternoon .
leonard_hofstadter I 'm sorry , are you suggesting that if we let Penny stay we might succumb to cannibalism ?
sheldon_cooper No - one ever thinks it will happen until it does .
leonard_hofstadter Penny , if you promise not to chew the flesh off our bones while we sleep , you can stay .
penny Hu ... what ?
sheldon_cooper He 's engaging in . It 's the logical fallacy of extending someone 's argument to ridiculous proportions and then criticizing the result , and I do not appreciate it .
leonard_hofstadter I 'll get you a blanket and a pillow .
sheldon_cooper Okay , well since I 'm obviously being ignored here , let 's go over the morning schedule , I use the bathroom , plan your ablutions and bodily functions accordingly .
penny How am I supposed to plan my bodily functions ?
sheldon_cooper I suggest no liquids after 11 pm .
leonard_hofstadter Here you go .
penny Thanks Leonard .
sheldon_cooper Hmmph , wrong .
penny I 'm listening .
sheldon_cooper Your head goes on the other end .
penny Why ?

sheldon_cooper It 's culturally universal , a bed , even a temporary bed , is always oriented with the headboard away from the door . It serves the ancient imperative of protecting oneself against marauders .
penny I 'll risk it .
sheldon_cooper Hm !
penny Anything else I should know ?
sheldon_cooper Yes . If you use my toothbrush I 'll jump out that window . Please do n't come to my funeral . Have a good night .
leonard_hofstadter Sorry about that .
penny That 's okay .
leonard_hofstadter FYI , his toothbrush is the red one in the plexiglass case under the UV light .
penny Got it .
leonard_hofstadter Well , sleep tight .
penny Thanks .
leonard_hofstadter Funny expression , sleep tight . It refers to the early construction of beds which featured a mattress suspended on interlocking ropes which would occasionally ... sleep tight .
leonard_hofstadter What are you doing ?

sheldon_cooper Every Saturday since we have lived in this apartment , I have awakened at 6 , poured myself a bowl of cereal , added a quarter cup of 2 % milk , sat on this end of this couch , turned on BBC America and watched Doctor Who .
leonard_hofstadter Penny 's still sleeping .
sheldon_cooper Every Saturday since we have lived in this apartment , I have awakened at 6 , poured myself a bowl of cereal ... .
leonard_hofstadter I know , I know , look , you have a TV in your room , why do n't you just have breakfast in bed ?
sheldon_cooper Because I am neither an invalid nor a woman celebrating Mother 's Day .
penny Uh , what time is it ?
leonard_hofstadter Almost 6 .
penny I slept all day ?
leonard_hofstadter Oh , no , it 's 6 in the morning .
penny What the hell is your problem ?
sheldon_cooper Okay , this cereal has lost all its molecular integrity , I now have a bowl of shredded wheat paste .
howard_wolowitz Hola , nerd - migos .
penny Why do you people hate sleep ? Are you wearing my robe ?
howard_wolowitz Oh , yeah , sorry , I 'll have it cleaned .
penny That 's okay , keep it . Where 's Christy .
howard_wolowitz In the shower . Oh , by the way , where did you get that loofah mitt ? Yours reaches places that mine just wo n't .
penny Y - you used my loofah ?
howard_wolowitz More precisely we used your loofah . I exfoliated her brains out !
penny You can keep that too .
howard_wolowitz Ah , well then we 'll probably need to talk about your stuffed bear collection .
christy_vanderbilt Howard ?
howard_wolowitz In here my lady .
christy_vanderbilt Mmmm , there 's my little engine that could .
howard_wolowitz chka - chka - chka - chka - chka - chka - chka .
sheldon_cooper Well there 's one beloved children 's book I 'll never read again .
christy_vanderbilt Hi , Christy .
leonard_hofstadter Leonard .
sheldon_cooper I 'm Sheldon .
christy_vanderbilt Right , you 're Howard 's entourage .
penny Uh , so Christy , what are your plans ?
christy_vanderbilt Oh , well , Howard said he 'd take me shopping in Beverley Hills .
penny Yeah , no , I meant plans to find some place to live . Other than with me , not that I do n't love having you , but it 's ... a little crowded .
leonard_hofstadter Penny , you 're always welcome to stay with us .
sheldon_cooper Oh , terrific , now we 're running a cute little B&B .
howard_wolowitz Let me offer a little outside the box thinking here , why does n't Christy stay with me ?
leonard_hofstadter For one thing you live with your mother .
howard_wolowitz I do not , my mother lives with me .

sheldon_cooper Well then , it 's all settled , Christy will stay with Howard , Penny can go back to her apartment , and I 'll watch the last 24 minutes of Doctor Who , although at this point it 's more like Doctor Why Bother .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon you just ca n't dictate ... .
sheldon_cooper No more talking , everybody go !
howard_wolowitz So , what do you say , you wanna repair to Casa Wolowitz ?
christy_vanderbilt What is that , like a Mexican deli ?
howard_wolowitz I 'm sorry , I should have mentioned this earlier , my last name is Wolowitz .
christy_vanderbilt Oh , that 's so cool . My first Jew !
sheldon_cooper I imagine there are n't many kosher corn - huskers .
christy_vanderbilt But you 're still taking me shopping , right ?
howard_wolowitz Anything you want .
christy_vanderbilt Okay , I 'll go pack my stuff .
howard_wolowitz When they perfect human cloning I 'm going to order twelve of those .
leonard_hofstadter Howard , ca n't you see she 's using you ?
howard_wolowitz Who cares , last night she pulled off her blouse and I wept !
penny Look , Howard , I know her , okay , she 'll have sex with anyone as long as they keep buying her things .
howard_wolowitz Really ?
penny Yeah .
howard_wolowitz Yay ! If you 'll excuse me , I have some Bar - Mitzvah bonds to cash .
sheldon_cooper I 'm sorry , we can not do this without Wolowitz .
leonard_hofstadter We ca n't order Chinese food without Wolowitz ?

sheldon_cooper Let me walk you through it , our standard is , the steamed dumpling appetizer , General Tso 's chicken , beef with broccoli , shrimp with lobster sauce and vegetable lo - main . Do you see the problem ?
leonard_hofstadter I see problem .
sheldon_cooper Our entire order is predicated on four dumplings and four entrees divided among four people .
leonard_hofstadter So , we 'll just order three entrees .
sheldon_cooper Fine , what do you want to eliminate , and who gets the extra dumpling ?
raj_koothrappali We could cut it into thirds .
sheldon_cooper Then it is no longer a dumpling , once you cut it open , it is at best a very small open faced sandwich .
waiter Hi fellas . Oh , where 's your annoying little friend who thinks he speaks Mandarin ?
sheldon_cooper He 's putting his needs ahead of the collective good . Where he comes from , that 's punishable by death .
waiter I come from Sacramento .
leonard_hofstadter Can we get an order of dumplings , but with three instead of four .
waiter No substitutions .
leonard_hofstadter This is n't a substitution , it 's a reduction .
waiter Okay , no reductions .
leonard_hofstadter Fine , bring us three orders of dumplings , that 's twelve , we 'll each have four .
raj_koothrappali That works .
sheldon_cooper No , if we fill up on dumplings we 'll need to eliminate another entree .
waiter No eliminations .
leonard_hofstadter If we have extra , we 'll just take the leftovers home .
sheldon_cooper And divide it how , I 'm telling you , we can not do this without Wolowitz .
leonard_hofstadter Wolowitz is with his new girlfriend , if you had let me invite Penny , then you would have had your fourth .
sheldon_cooper Have you seen Penny eat Chinese food ? She uses a fork , and she double dips her egg rolls .
leonard_hofstadter We do n't order egg rolls .
sheldon_cooper Exactly , but we 'd have to if she was here .
raj_koothrappali Can we please make a decision , not only are there children starving in India , there 's an Indian starving right here .
leonard_hofstadter Here 's an idea , why do n't we just go out for Indian food .
sheldon_cooper No .
raj_koothrappali Uurgh .

waiter You are nice boys . Tell you what I 'm going to do . I 'm going to bring you the four dumplings . When I 'm walking over to the table , maybe I get bumped , one of the dumplings falls to the floor , no - one has to know .
sheldon_cooper I 'll know .
raj_koothrappali How about soup ?
leonard_hofstadter Yeah , we can always divide soup .
sheldon_cooper What about the won - tons ?
penny Oh , hey guys , what 's up ?
sheldon_cooper It 's Halo night .
penny Yeah . Okay . So ?
leonard_hofstadter Well , with Wolowitz spending all of his time with your friend Christy , .
penny She 's not my friend . Friends do not get their friends care bears all sweaty .
leonard_hofstadter Right , anyway , uh , with Wolowitz occupied elsewhere , we had something we wanted to ask you . Sheldon ?
sheldon_cooper Yes . Penny , we would very much appreciate it if you would be the fourth member of our Halo team . I do n't think I need to tell you what an honor this is .
penny Oh , that 's so sweet . But I 'm going out dancing with a girlfriend .
sheldon_cooper You ca n't go out , it 's Halo night .
penny Well , for Penny it 's dancing night .
sheldon_cooper You go dancing every Wednesday ?
penny No .
penny Look , why do n't I play with you guys tomorrow ?
sheldon_cooper Tonight is Halo night ! It 's like talking to a wall .
penny Alright , now Sheldon , you and I are about to have a problem .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon , remember , we role - played this .
sheldon_cooper Yes , but you did n't portray her as completely irrational .
penny Alright fellas , I got ta go . Good luck .
leonard_hofstadter Maybe we should have asked if we could go dancing with her and her girlfriend .
sheldon_cooper Okay , assuming we could dance , which we ca n't , there are three of us and two of them .
leonard_hofstadter So ?
sheldon_cooper It 's the Chinese restaurant all over again . I assure you that cutting a dumpling in thirds is child 's play compared with three men , each attempting to dance with 67 % of a woman .
leonard_hofstadter Aaah , for God 's sake , Sheldon , you are driving me crazy .
sheldon_cooper Your anger 's not with me , sir , but with basic mathematics .
leonard_hofstadter No , I 'm pretty sure my anger 's with you .
raj_koothrappali What 's happening to us ? We 're falling apart .
leonard_hofstadter Who are you calling ?
sheldon_cooper The only man who can restore any semblance of balance to our universe .
howard_wolowitz Hi this is Howard Wolowitz .
christy_vanderbilt And this is Christy Van Der Bell .
howard_wolowitz We ca n't get to the phone right now because we 're having sex !
christy_vanderbilt You 're not going to put that on your message are you ?
howard_wolowitz No , I 'm just kidding , I 'll re - record it .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon , think this through , you 're going to ask Howard to choose between sex and Halo .
sheldon_cooper No , I 'm going to ask him to choose between sex and Halo 3 . As far as I know , sex has not been upgraded to include high - def graphics and enhanced weapon systems .
leonard_hofstadter You 're right , all sex has is nudity , orgasms and human contact .
sheldon_cooper My point .
christy_vanderbilt I 'm just saying , you can take the damned plastic off the couch once in a while .
debbie_wolowitz Why , so you and Howard can hump on it ?
howard_wolowitz Ladies , ladies , I 'm sure there 's a middle ground .
christy_vanderbilt@debbie_wolowitz Shut up , Howard !
howard_wolowitz You girl talk , I 'm going to take my scooter out for a little spin .
christy_vanderbilt Are you happy ? You drove your own son out of the house !
debbie_wolowitz Why do n't you stop butting in where you do n't belong ?
howard_wolowitz What are you guys doing here ?
sheldon_cooper It 's Halo night .
debbie_wolowitz He 's not a man , he 's a putz , and do n't you take that tone with me , you gold digger .
christy_vanderbilt What did you call me ?
debbie_wolowitz You heard me , and I 'll tell you something else , you 're barking up the wrong tree , 'cause as long as you 're around , Howard is out of the will .
christy_vanderbilt You know what ? I got better offers . I 'm outta here !
debbie_wolowitz That 's right , go back to Babylon , you whore !
howard_wolowitz So , Halo night , huh ?
raj_koothrappali I thought she was the whore of Omaha ?
sheldon_cooper Shhh !
howard_wolowitz Sheldon , you got him in your sights , fire , he 's charging his plasma rifle .
sheldon_cooper I ca n't shoot now , I 'm cloaking .
leonard_hofstadter Now , Raj , kill Sheldon .
raj_koothrappali I ca n't see him !
sheldon_cooper That 's why the call it cloaking , dead man .
leonard_hofstadter Well then start throwing grenades .
raj_koothrappali I 'm all out !
penny Hi guys , my friends and I got tired of dancing , so we came over to have sex with you .
leonard_hofstadter That will do , Raj , straight for the tank .
sheldon_cooper We said no tanks .
raj_koothrappali There are no rules in hell !
howard_wolowitz Son of a bitch , medpack , I need a medpack !
penny Told yah ! .
leonard_hofstadter There 's a sniper , use your rocket launcher .
raj_koothrappali All I 've got is a needler , and I 'm all out of ammo .
sheldon_cooper And now you 're out of life ! Why did you hit pause ?
leonard_hofstadter I thought I heard something .
raj_koothrappali What ?
leonard_hofstadter No , never mind , alright , go .
